class_notes:
(Permission Required Prior to Enrollment)


Email George Staib, gstaib@emory.edu for permission. Prerequisite: DANC 350
course_description: This course supports students who are continuing to create original choreographic work for the Emory Dance Company after successfully completing Choreography I and II. The lab is designed to provide ongoing feedback during the creative process.
prerequisites: This course requires DANC 350 AND DANC 250 AND DANC 150 or equivalent transfer credit as a prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 3780, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: M 6-8p, Instructor: G. Staib, Status: Open
